name: Sin
author: まるき
description:
noun.
 an immoral act considered to be a transgression against divine law.
Like the definition, this palette can be considered a crime against 
traditional color theories: the highlights are bright cyan and the 
shadows come from the green and yellow family, with a tint of purple. 
Even the number of colors is cabalistic: Jesus had 12 apostoles, the 
Pantheon is composed by 12 Olympian Gods, the Sun god Surya has 12 names
 and the human body has twelve cranial nerves, etc. By using this 
palette, you may be getting closer to a more solid truth, who knows. It 
may be worth trying, because most things in life can serve as a valid 
experience, even falling from grace.
